description: Detects file names used by different memory dumping tools to create a memory dump of the LSASS process memory, which contains user credentials Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: LSASS Process Memory Dump Files
query: (file.path:(*\\lsass.dmp OR *\\lsass.zip OR *\\lsass.rar OR *\\Temp\\dumpert.dmp) OR file.path:(*\\lsass_2* OR *\\lsassdump* OR *\\lsassdmp*))
